document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the genus Macroteratura Gorochov, 1993 (Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae Meconematini) with description of one new species from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Xiphidiopsis megafurcula Tinkham, 1944
,
Proc. U. S. Nat. Mus
., 94: 614.

Teratura ( Macroteratura ) megafurcula : Gorochov, 1993
, Zoosyst. Rossic a, 2(1): 70;
Gorochov et al. , 2005
, Oriental Insects , 39: 69.

Kuzicus ( Macroteraturus) megafurculus :
Liu & Yin, 2004
, In : Yang, X.K. (Ed.),
Insects from Mt. Shiwandashan Area of Guangxi
, 102.

Macroteratura ( Macroteratura ) megafurcula :
Liu et al ., 2010
, In : Xu, H.C. & Ye, T.X. (Eds.), Insects of Fengyangshan National Nature Reserve , 82.

Male genitalia. Genitalia with dorsal surface slightly sclerotized, nearly sword-like ( Fig. 4C ), tapering toward apex; titillator sclerotized, apex acute, basal half expanded, lamellate, and pointing upwards; ventral surface of genitalia membranous.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3. Male genitalia, A–B .
Macroteratura ( Macroteratura ) thrinaca ( Qiu & Shi, 2010 )
; C–D .
Macroteratura ( Macroteratura ) megafurcula ( Tinkham, 1944 )
: A , C . dorsal view; B , D . ventral view.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. China ( Anhui , Chongqing , Fujian , Guangdong , Guizhou , Hubei , Hunan , Guangxi , Jiangxi , Sichuan , Zhejiang ).
